Symbol.Script_3D:
EPS = 0.00001
if gs_frame_wthk = 0 then mmask=10 else mmask=12 if gs_frame_wthk = 0 then mmask2=10 else mmask2=14
!******* Hotspots for "Associative" dimensioning
IF bShowUnitHotspots THEN addz WALL_THICKNESS-WIDO_SILL hotspot -A/2 - gs_frame_width_left, 0, 0, 100 hotspot A/2 + gs_frame_width_left, 0, 0, 101 hotspot -A/2 - gs_frame_width_left, 0, gs_fthk, 102 hotspot A/2 + gs_frame_width_left, 0, gs_fthk, 103
hotspot -A/2 - gs_frame_width_left, b + gs_frwt, 0, 104 hotspot A/2 + gs_frame_width_left, b + gs_frwt, 0, 105 hotspot -A/2 - gs_frame_width_left, b + gs_frwt, gs_fthk, 106 hotspot A/2 + gs_frame_width_left, b + gs_frwt, gs_fthk, 107 del 1 ENDIF
if iDoorPanelType<>0 & bOplines3d then add -a/2, 0, WALL_THICKNESS + 0.035 + gs_leaf_thk + 0.0001 mulz -1 call "OpeningLines" parameters a = a, b = b, frameThickness = gs_leaf_thk + 0.0002, iOpeningType = 14, ! SASH_UP_SLIDING opLineType3dIn = opLineType3dIn, opLineType3dOut = opLineType3dOut, gs_opLinePen = gs_opLinePen, gs_opline_style_m = gs_opline_style_m, bArrowWithoutEnd = 1
del 2 endif
material gs_frame_mat
!********************* coordinates according to size types
unitleft = -ac_unit_width / 2 unitright = ac_unit_width / 2 leafleft = -ac_leaf_width / 2 leafright = ac_leaf_width / 2 egressleft = -ac_egress_width / 2 egressright = ac_egress_width / 2
frameDiff = (gs_frw1 - gs_frw2) / 2
frameleft = unitleft frameright = unitright
unittop = ac_unit_height leaftop = ac_leaf_height egresstop = ac_egress_height
frametop = unittop
!************* Hotspots on Leaf Size
leafthk1=gs_leaf_thk leafleft1=leafleft leafright1=leafright
if bShowLeafHotspots then addz WALL_THICKNESS-WIDO_SILL hotspot leafleft + frameDiff, leaftop, 0, 310 hotspot leafright + frameDiff, leaftop, 0, 311 del 1 endif
if bShowAddHotspotsForIS then addz WALL_THICKNESS-WIDO_SILL hotspot leafleft + frameDiff, 0, 0, 300 hotspot leafright + frameDiff, 0, 0, 301 del 1 endif
!************* End of Hotspots on Leaf Size
ADDZ WALL_THICKNESS-WIDO_SILL
!! FRAME !! !! SIMPLE 3D !! IF (GLOB_CONTEXT<>4 AND lod3d=1) THEN ADD a/2, fb-gs_frwt, 0 ROTY -90 MATERIAL gs_frame_mat SPRISM_{2} gs_frame_mat2, gs_frame_mat2, gs_frame_mat2, 5, 0,0, 0,1, 0, 0, 0,0, 0,1, a, 0, 0, gs_frwt, 15, gs_frame_mat, 0, 0, 15, gs_frame_mat, 0.035, 0, 15, gs_frame_mat2, 0.035, gs_frwt, 15, gs_frame_mat2, 0, gs_frwt, -1, gs_frame_mat2 DEL 2
FOR HI=1 TO 2 ADDX -a/2 ROTX -90 MATERIAL gs_frame_mat
SPRISM_{2} gs_frame_mat2, gs_frame_mat2, gs_frame_mat2, 9, 0,0, 0,1, 0, 0, 0,0, 0,1, fb, 0, -gs_frame_width_left, -gs_frame_thk, 15, gs_frame_mat2, -gs_frame_width_left+gs_frame_pthk, -gs_frame_thk, 15, gs_frame_mat2, -gs_frame_width_left+gs_frame_pthk, -gs_frame_pthk, 15, gs_frame_mat2, -gs_frame_pthk, -gs_frame_pthk, 15, gs_frame_mat2, -gs_frame_pthk, -0.035, 15, gs_frame_mat2, 0, -0.035, 15, gs_frame_mat, 0, 0, 15, gs_frame_mat, -gs_frame_width_left, 0, 15, gs_frame_mat2, -gs_frame_width_left, -gs_frame_thk, -1, gs_frame_mat2 DEL 2
IF gs_track=1 THEN ress=15 teta=90/ress alpha=0
FOR HE=1 TO ress PUT 0, gs_track_radius*SIN(alpha)+fb-gs_track_radius, -gs_track_radius*COS(alpha)+gs_track_radius, 0 alpha=alpha+teta NEXT HE
ADDX a/2 MATERIAL gs_track_mat TUBE 5, 5+ress, 1+2+16+32, -gs_frame_width_left+gs_frame_pthk, track_dz+gs_track_thk, 0, -gs_frame_width_left+gs_frame_pthk+gs_track_width, track_dz+gs_track_thk, 0, -gs_frame_width_left+gs_frame_pthk+gs_track_width, track_dz, 0, -gs_frame_width_left+gs_frame_pthk, track_dz, 0, -gs_frame_width_left+gs_frame_pthk, track_dz+gs_track_thk, -1,
0, -1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, GET (ress*4), 0, fb, gs_track_radius, 0, 0, fb, fb+0.41, 0, 0, fb, fb+0.41+1, 0 DEL 1
ADDX -a/2 TUBE 5, 4, 1+2+16+32, -gs_frame_width_left, 0, 0, -gs_frame_width_left+gs_track_width, 0, 0, -gs_frame_width_left+gs_track_width, gs_track_thk, 0, -gs_frame_width_left, gs_track_thk, 0, -gs_frame_width_left, 0, -1,
0, fb-track_dz+gs_track_thk, fb+0.41+1, 0, 0, fb-track_dz+gs_track_thk, fb+0.41, 0, 0, fb-track_dz+gs_track_thk, track_dz, 0, 0, fb-track_dz+gs_track_thk, -1, 0
DEL 1 ENDIF MULX -1 NEXT HI DEL 2 ENDIF !! END OF SIMPLE 3D !!
!! DETAILED 3D !! IF lod3D = 2 THEN ADD a/2, fb-gs_frwt, 0 ROTY -90 MATERIAL gs_frame_mat ! -- Top Frame SPRISM_{2} gs_frame_mat2, gs_frame_mat2, gs_frame_mat2, 9, 0,0, 0,1, 0, 0, 0,0, 0,1, a, 0, 0, 0, 15, gs_frame_mat, 0.035, 0, 15, gs_frame_mat2, 0.035, gs_frame_pthk, 15, gs_frame_mat2, gs_frame_pthk, gs_frame_pthk, 15, gs_frame_mat2, gs_frame_pthk, gs_frwt-gs_frame_pthk, 15, gs_frame_mat2, 0.035, gs_frwt-gs_frame_pthk, 15, gs_frame_mat2, 0.035, gs_frwt, 15, gs_frame_mat2, 0, gs_frwt, 15, gs_frame_mat, 0, 0, -1, gs_frame_mat2 DEL 2
FOR HI=1 TO 2 if hi = 1 then frameWidth = gs_frame_width_left else frameWidth = gs_frame_width_right endif
ADDX -a/2 ROTX -90 ! --- Side frames SPRISM_{2} gs_frame_mat2, gs_frame_mat2, gs_frame_mat2, 9, 0,0, 0,1, 0, 0, 0,0, 0,1, fb, 0, -frameWidth, -gs_frame_thk, 15, gs_frame_mat2, -frameWidth+gs_frame_pthk, -gs_frame_thk, 15, gs_frame_mat2, -frameWidth+gs_frame_pthk, -gs_frame_pthk, 15, gs_frame_mat2, -gs_frame_pthk, -gs_frame_pthk, 15, gs_frame_mat2, -gs_frame_pthk, -0.035, 15, gs_frame_mat2, 0, -0.035, 15, gs_frame_mat, 0, 0, 15, gs_frame_mat, -frameWidth, 0, 15, gs_frame_mat2, -frameWidth, -gs_frame_thk, -1, gs_frame_mat2 DEL 2
IF gs_track=1 THEN if hi = 1 then addx (gs_frame_width_right - gs_frame_width_left) else addx -(gs_frame_width_right - gs_frame_width_left) endif
ress=15 teta=90/ress alpha=0
FOR HE=1 TO ress PUT 0, gs_track_radius*SIN(alpha)+fb-gs_track_radius, -gs_track_radius*COS(alpha)+gs_track_radius, 0 alpha=alpha+teta NEXT HE
addz 0.008 ADDX a/2 MATERIAL gs_track_mat
TUBE 9, 5+ress, 1+2+16+32, -frameWidth+gs_frame_pthk+gs_track_width, track_dz, 0, -frameWidth+gs_frame_pthk, track_dz, 0, -frameWidth+gs_frame_pthk, track_dz+gs_track_thk, 0, -frameWidth+gs_frame_pthk+gs_track_width, track_dz+gs_track_thk, 0, -frameWidth+gs_frame_pthk+gs_track_width, track_dz+gs_track_thk-gs_frame_pthk, 0, -frameWidth+gs_frame_pthk*2, track_dz+gs_track_thk-gs_frame_pthk, 0, -frameWidth+gs_frame_pthk*2, track_dz+gs_frame_pthk, 0, -frameWidth+gs_frame_pthk+gs_track_width, track_dz+gs_frame_pthk, 0, -frameWidth+gs_frame_pthk+gs_track_width, track_dz, -1,
0, -1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, GET (ress*4), 0, fb, gs_track_radius, 0, 0, fb, fb+0.41, 0, 0, fb, fb+0.41+1, 0 DEL 1
ADDX -a/2 TUBE 9, 4, 1+2+16+32, -frameWidth+gs_frame_pthk, 0, 0, -frameWidth+gs_frame_pthk+gs_track_width, 0, 0, -frameWidth+gs_frame_pthk+gs_track_width, gs_frame_pthk, 0, -frameWidth+gs_frame_pthk*2, gs_frame_pthk, 0, -frameWidth+gs_frame_pthk*2, gs_track_thk-gs_frame_pthk, 0, -frameWidth+gs_frame_pthk+gs_track_width, gs_track_thk-gs_frame_pthk, 0, -frameWidth+gs_frame_pthk+gs_track_width, gs_track_thk, 0, -frameWidth+gs_frame_pthk, gs_track_thk, 0, -frameWidth+gs_frame_pthk, 0, -1,
0, fb-track_dz+gs_track_thk, fb+0.41+1, 0, 0, fb-track_dz+gs_track_thk, fb+0.41, 0, 0, fb-track_dz+gs_track_thk, track_dz, 0, 0, fb-track_dz+gs_track_thk, -1, 0
DEL 1
MATERIAL gs_track_mat ADDZ 1-0.0225 PRISM_ 7, 0.045, -a/2-0.078, fb-0.103, 15, -a/2-0.078, fb-0.002, 15, -a/2-0.078+0.12, fb-0.002, 15, -a/2-0.078+0.12, fb, 15, -a/2-0.08, fb, 15, -a/2-0.08, fb-0.103, 15, -a/2-0.078, fb-0.103, -1 DEL 3 ENDIF MULX -1 NEXT HI DEL 2
IF gs_track=1 THEN ADD (gs_frame_width_right - gs_frame_width_left) / 2, fb-track_dz+gs_track_thk, fb+0.41+(gs_btype_m=3)*0.24 addz 0.008 ROTX 90 PRISM_ 9, gs_track_thk, -a/2-0.09, 0, 15, a/2+0.09, 0, 15, a/2+0.09, 0.12, 15, a/2+0.09-gs_frame_pthk, 0.12, 15, a/2+0.09-gs_frame_pthk, gs_frame_pthk, 15, -a/2-0.09+gs_frame_pthk, gs_frame_pthk, 15, -a/2-0.09+gs_frame_pthk, 0.12, 15, -a/2-0.09, 0.12, 15, -a/2-0.09, 0, -1 DEL 3 ENDIF ENDIF !! END OF DETAILED 3D !! !! END OF FRAME !!
if gs_mot_m = 0 then end ! PANEL TYPE = EMPTY
!! LEAF !! PEN gs_leaf_pen MATERIAL gs_leaf_matin sect_fill gs_fillLeaf, gs_penLeaf_bg, gs_penLeaf_fg, gs_leaf_pen_2D
ADD (gs_frame_width_right - gs_frame_width_left) / 2, 0, (WALL_THICKNESS-WIDO_SILL)*0
FOR HI=1 TO gs_section_num
IF HI=1 AND gs_section_num>1 THEN ADD 0, gm/2, gt
IF utv<=szute-sszb THEN ADDY op3D/100*szut fi1=0 ROTX fi1 ENDIF
IF utv>szute-sszb AND utv<szute THEN ADD 0, op3D/100*szut, 0 y1=szute-op3D/100*szut z1=SQR(rkk**2+y1**2) delta=ATN(rkk/y1) beta=ACS(MIN((sszb**2+z1**2-rkk**2)/2/z1/sszb,1)) leta=180-delta sszm=SQR(rkk**2+z1**2-2*rkk*z1*COS(leta))
IF sszb<=sszm THEN fi1=delta-beta IF sszb>sszm THEN fi1=ACS((rkk+y1)/sszb) ROTX fi1 ENDIF
IF utv>=szute AND utv<=szut THEN szez1=(op3D-(szute/szut*100))/(100-(szute/szut*100)) ADD 0, szute+rkk*SIN(szez1*90), rkk-rkk*COS(szez1*90) fi1=ACS((rkk*(1-SIN(szez1*90)))/sszb) ROTX fi1 ENDIF
ADD 0, -gm/2, -gs_gtav
IF lod3D = 2 THEN IF gs_passdoor=1 AND gs_open_3D>0 AND ABS(gs_open3D)<eps THEN MATERIAL gs_leaf_matin CUTPOLYA 5, 2, 0, sza/2-gs_bkx/2-gs_passdoorWidth, gs_gm/2+gs_bky/2, 7, sza/2-gs_bkx/2, gs_gm/2+gs_bky/2, 7, sza/2-gs_bkx/2, b-gs_bky/2, 7, sza/2-gs_bkx/2-gs_passdoorWidth, b-gs_bky/2, 7, sza/2-gs_bkx/2-gs_passdoorWidth, gs_gm/2+gs_bky/2, -1 ENDIF
ADD sza/2, 0, 0.001 ROTY -90 SPRISM_{2} gs_leaf_mat, gs_leaf_mat, gs_leaf_mat, 5, 0, 0, 1, 0, sza, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, -0.0075+gs_leaf_thk/2, gm/2+sszb, 15, gs_leaf_matin, 0.0075+gs_leaf_thk/2, gm/2+sszb, 15, gs_leaf_matin, 0.005+gs_leaf_thk/2, gm/2+sszb+0.025, 15, gs_leaf_matin, -0.005+gs_leaf_thk/2, gm/2+sszb+0.025, 15, gs_leaf_mat, -0.0075+gs_leaf_thk/2, gm/2+sszb, -1, gs_leaf_matin DEL 2
IF gs_passdoor=1 AND gs_open_3D>0 AND ABS(gs_open3D)<eps THEN CUTEND ENDIF
CUTPOLY 4, -sza/2, szb*2, sza/2, szb*2, sza/2, gm/2+sszb, -sza/2, gm/2+sszb
CUTPOLY 4, -sza/2, sszb/2, -sza, sszb/2, -sza, sszb*(gs_section_num+0.5), -sza/2, sszb*(gs_section_num+0.5)
CUTPOLY 4, sza/2, sszb/2, sza, sszb/2, sza, sszb*(gs_section_num+0.5), sza/2, sszb*(gs_section_num+0.5) ENDIF
IF HI=2 AND gs_section_num>2 THEN gop=op3D+sszb/szut*100
ADD 0, gm/2, gt
IF utv<=szute-2*sszb THEN ADDY gop/100*szut fi2=0 ROTX fi2 ENDIF
IF utv>szute-2*sszb AND utv<szute-sszb THEN ADD 0, gop/100*szut, 0 y1=szute-gop/100*szut z1=SQR(rkk**2+y1**2) delta=ATN(rkk/y1) leta=180-delta sszm=SQR(rkk**2+z1**2-2*rkk*z1*COS(leta))
y1=szute-gop/100*szut z1=SQR(rkk**2+y1**2) delta=ATN(rkk/y1) deta=ACS(MAX((rkk**2+z1**2-sszb**2)/2/z1/rkk, -1)) feta=deta-90+delta beta=ACS(MIN((sszb**2+z1**2-rkk**2)/2/z1/sszb, 1))
IF sszb<=sszm THEN fi2=delta-beta IF sszb>sszm THEN fi2=ACS((rkk+y1)/sszb) ROTX fi2 ENDIF
IF utv>=szute-sszb AND utv<=szut-(SQR(sszb**2-rkk**2)-rkk+rkk*PI/2) THEN y1=szute-op3D/100*szut z1=SQR(rkk**2+y1**2) delta=ATN(rkk/y1) deta=ACS((rkk**2+z1**2-sszb**2)/2/z1/rkk) feta=deta-90+delta sziv=rkk*PI*feta/180 gor=((szute+sziv)/szut*100) beta=ACS((sszb**2+z1**2-rkk**2)/2/z1/sszb)
szez=(gor-(szute/szut*100))/(100-(szute/szut*100)) IF szez<0 THEN szez=1 ADD 0, szute+rkk*SIN(szez*90), rkk-rkk*COS(szez*90) IF (rkk*(1-SIN(szez*90)))/sszb<1 THEN fi2=ACS(MIN((rkk*(1-SIN(szez*90)))/sszb, 1)) IF (rkk*(1-SIN(szez*90)))/sszb>1 THEN fi2=90 ROTX fi2 ENDIF
IF utv>szut-(SQR(sszb**2-rkk**2)-rkk+rkk*PI/2) AND utv<=szut THEN ADD 0, szute+rkk, rkk-rkk*COS(szez1*90)+sszb*(SIN(fi1)) fi2=90 ROTX fi2 ENDIF
ADD 0, -gm/2-sszb, -gs_gtav
IF lod3D = 2 THEN IF gs_passdoor=1 AND gs_open_3D>0 AND ABS(gs_open3D)<eps THEN MATERIAL gs_leaf_matin CUTPOLYA 5, 2, 0, sza/2-gs_bkx/2-gs_passdoorWidth, gs_gm/2+gs_bky/2, 7, sza/2-gs_bkx/2, gs_gm/2+gs_bky/2, 7, sza/2-gs_bkx/2, b-gs_bky/2, 7, sza/2-gs_bkx/2-gs_passdoorWidth, b-gs_bky/2, 7, sza/2-gs_bkx/2-gs_passdoorWidth, gs_gm/2+gs_bky/2, -1 ENDIF
ADD sza/2, sszb, 0.001 ROTY -90 SPRISM_{2} gs_leaf_matin, gs_leaf_matin, gs_leaf_matin, 5, 0, 0, 1, 0, sza, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, -0.0075+gs_leaf_thk/2, gm/2+sszb, 15, gs_leaf_matin, 0.0075+gs_leaf_thk/2, gm/2+sszb, 15, gs_leaf_matin, 0.005+gs_leaf_thk/2, gm/2+sszb+0.025, 15, gs_leaf_matin, -0.005+gs_leaf_thk/2, gm/2+sszb+0.025, 15, gs_leaf_mat, -0.0075+gs_leaf_thk/2, gm/2+sszb, -1, gs_leaf_matin DEL 2
IF gs_passdoor=1 AND gs_open_3D>0 AND ABS(gs_open3D)<eps THEN CUTEND ENDIF
CUTPOLY 4, -sza/2, 0, sza/2, 0, sza/2, gm/2+sszb, -sza/2, gm/2+sszb
CUTPOLY 4, -sza/2, szb*2, sza/2, szb*2, sza/2, gm/2+sszb*2, -sza/2, gm/2+sszb*2
CUTPOLY 4, -sza/2, 0, -sza, 0, -sza, sszb/2, -sza/2, sszb/2
CUTPOLY 4, sza/2, 0, sza, 0, sza, sszb/2, sza/2, sszb/2
CUTPOLY 4, -sza/2, 1.5*sszb, -sza, 1.5*sszb, -sza, sszb*(gs_section_num+0.5), -sza/2, sszb*(gs_section_num+0.5)
CUTPOLY 4, sza/2, 1.5*sszb, sza, 1.5*sszb, sza, sszb*(gs_section_num+0.5), sza/2, sszb*(gs_section_num+0.5) ENDIF
IF HI=3 AND gs_section_num>3 THEN gop=op3D+2*sszb/szut*100
ADD 0, gm/2, gt
IF utv<=szute-3*sszb THEN ADDY gop/100*szut fi3=0 ROTX fi3 ENDIF
IF utv>szute-3*sszb AND utv<szute-2*sszb THEN ADD 0, gop/100*szut, 0 y1=szute-gop/100*szut z1=SQR(rkk**2+y1**2) delta=ATN(rkk/y1) beta=ACS((sszb**2+z1**2-rkk**2)/2/z1/sszb) leta=180-delta sszm=SQR(rkk**2+z1**2-2*rkk*z1*COS(leta))
y1=szute-gop/100*szut z1=SQR(rkk**2+y1**2) delta=ATN(rkk/y1) deta=ACS((rkk**2+z1**2-sszb**2)/2/z1/rkk) feta=deta-90+delta
beta=ACS((sszb**2+z1**2-rkk**2)/2/z1/sszb)
IF sszb<=sszm THEN fi3=delta-beta IF sszb>sszm THEN fi3=ACS((rkk+y1)/sszb) ROTX fi3 ENDIF
IF utv>=szute-2*sszb AND utv<=szut-(SQR(sszb**2-rkk**2)-rkk+rkk*PI/2)-sszb THEN y1=szute-op3D/100*szut-sszb z1=SQR(rkk**2+y1**2) delta=ATN(rkk/y1) deta=ACS((rkk**2+z1**2-sszb**2)/2/z1/rkk) feta=deta-90+delta sziv=rkk*PI*feta/180 gor=((szute+sziv)/szut*100) beta=ACS((sszb**2+z1**2-rkk**2)/2/z1/sszb)
szez=(gor-(szute/szut*100))/(100-(szute/szut*100)) ADD 0, szute+rkk*SIN(szez*90), rkk-rkk*COS(szez*90)
fi3=ACS((rkk*(1-SIN(szez*90)))/sszb) ROTX fi3 ENDIF
IF utv>szut-(SQR(sszb**2-rkk**2)-rkk+rkk*PI/2)-sszb AND utv<=szut THEN ADD 0, szute+rkk, rkk-rkk*COS(szez1*90)+sszb*(SIN(fi1)+SIN(fi2)) fi3=90 ROTX fi3 ENDIF
ADD 0, -gm/2-2*sszb, -gs_gtav
IF lod3D = 2 THEN IF gs_passdoor=1 AND gs_open_3D>0 AND ABS(gs_open3D)<eps THEN MATERIAL gs_leaf_matin CUTPOLYA 5, 2, 0, sza/2-gs_bkx/2-gs_passdoorWidth, gs_gm/2+gs_bky/2, 7, sza/2-gs_bkx/2, gs_gm/2+gs_bky/2, 7, sza/2-gs_bkx/2, b-gs_bky/2, 7, sza/2-gs_bkx/2-gs_passdoorWidth, b-gs_bky/2, 7, sza/2-gs_bkx/2-gs_passdoorWidth, gs_gm/2+gs_bky/2, -1 ENDIF
ADD sza/2, 2*sszb, 0.001 ROTY -90 SPRISM_{2} gs_leaf_matin, gs_leaf_matin, gs_leaf_matin, 5, 0, 0, 1, 0, sza, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, -0.0075+gs_leaf_thk/2, gm/2+sszb, 15, gs_leaf_matin, 0.0075+gs_leaf_thk/2, gm/2+sszb, 15, gs_leaf_matin, 0.005+gs_leaf_thk/2, gm/2+sszb+0.025, 15, gs_leaf_matin, -0.005+gs_leaf_thk/2, gm/2+sszb+0.025, 15, gs_leaf_mat, -0.0075+gs_leaf_thk/2, gm/2+sszb, -1, gs_leaf_matin DEL 2
IF gs_passdoor=1 AND gs_open_3D>0 AND ABS(gs_open3D)<eps THEN CUTEND ENDIF
CUTPOLY 4, -sza/2, 0, sza/2, 0, sza/2, gm/2+2*sszb, -sza/2, gm/2+2*sszb
CUTPOLY 4, -sza/2, szb*2, sza/2, szb*2, sza/2, gm/2+sszb*3, -sza/2, gm/2+sszb*3
CUTPOLY 4, -sza/2, 0, -sza, 0, -sza, sszb*1.5, -sza/2, sszb*1.5
CUTPOLY 4, sza/2, 0, sza, 0, sza, sszb*1.5, sza/2, sszb*1.5
CUTPOLY 4, -sza/2, 2.5*sszb, -sza, 2.5*sszb, -sza, sszb*(gs_section_num+0.5), -sza/2, sszb*(gs_section_num+0.5)
CUTPOLY 4, sza/2, 2.5*sszb, sza, 2.5*sszb, sza, sszb*(gs_section_num+0.5), sza/2, sszb*(gs_section_num+0.5) ENDIF
IF HI=4 AND gs_section_num>4 THEN gop=op3D+(gs_section_num-2)*sszb/szut*100
ADD 0, gm/2, gt
IF utv<=szute-4*sszb THEN ADDY gop/100*szut fi4=0 ROTX fi4 ENDIF
IF utv>szute-4*sszb AND utv<szute-3*sszb THEN ADD 0, gop/100*szut, 0 y1=szute-gop/100*szut z1=SQR(rkk**2+y1**2) delta=ATN(rkk/y1) beta=ACS((sszb**2+z1**2-rkk**2)/2/z1/sszb) leta=180-delta sszm=SQR(rkk**2+z1**2-2*rkk*z1*COS(leta))
y1=szute-gop/100*szut z1=SQR(rkk**2+y1**2) delta=ATN(rkk/y1) deta=ACS((rkk**2+z1**2-sszb**2)/2/z1/rkk) feta=deta-90+delta
beta=ACS((sszb**2+z1**2-rkk**2)/2/z1/sszb)
IF sszb<=sszm THEN fi4=delta-beta IF sszb>sszm THEN fi4=ACS((rkk+y1)/sszb) ROTX fi4 ENDIF
IF utv>=szute-3*sszb AND utv<=szut-(SQR(sszb**2-rkk**2)-rkk+rkk*PI/2)-2*sszb THEN y1=szute-op3D/100*szut-sszb*2 z1=SQR(rkk**2+y1**2) delta=ATN(rkk/y1) deta=ACS((rkk**2+z1**2-sszb**2)/2/z1/rkk) feta=deta-90+delta sziv=rkk*PI*feta/180 gor=((szute+sziv)/szut*100) beta=ACS((sszb**2+z1**2-rkk**2)/2/z1/sszb)
szez=(gor-(szute/szut*100))/(100-(szute/szut*100)) ADD 0, utv+sszb*(COS(fi1)+COS(fi2)+COS(fi3)), rkk-rkk*COS(szez1*90)+sszb*(SIN(fi1)+SIN(fi2)+SIN(fi3))
fix4=szute+rkk-utv-sszb*(COS(fi1)+COS(fi2)+COS(fi3)) fi4=ACS(fix4/sszb) alfa2=ACS(MIN((rkk*(1-SIN(szez*90)))/sszb, 1)) ROTX fi4 ENDIF
IF utv>szut-(SQR(sszb**2-rkk**2)-rkk+rkk*PI/2)-2*sszb AND utv<=szut THEN ADD 0, szute+rkk, rkk-rkk*COS(szez1*90)+sszb*(SIN(fi1)+SIN(fi2)+SIN(fi3)) fi4=90 ROTX fi4 ENDIF

IF HI=gs_section_num THEN gop=op3D+(gs_section_num-1)*sszb/szut*100

ROTX alfa+beta ENDIF

szez=(gor-(szute/szut*100))/(100-(szute/szut*100)) ADD 0, szute+rkk*SIN(szez*90), rkk-rkk*COS(szez*90)

ROTX alfa+beta ENDIF

szez=(gor-(szute/szut*100))/(100-(szute/szut*100)) ADD 0, szute+rkk*SIN(szez*90), rkk-rkk*COS(szez*90)

ROTX alfa+beta ENDIF

unID=unID+1 if WIDO_REVEAL_SIDE then hotspot sza/2-gs_bkx/2,b,0,unID,gs_open_3D,7 else hotspot sza/2-gs_bkx/2,0,0,unID,gs_open_3D,7 endif ENDIF

del 1 endif

Symbol.Script_2D:
line_type gs_linetype
unID_Opening = 1000
!****** Scale settings *******
if lod2D = DET2D_OFF then end
if lod2D = DET2D_DETAILED_CHI then lod2D = DET2D_DETAILED if lod2D = DET2D_SIMPLE_CHI then lod2D = DET2D_MIDDLE
!********************* coordinates according to size types
unitleft = -ac_unit_width / 2 unitright = ac_unit_width / 2 leafleft = -ac_leaf_width / 2 leafright = ac_leaf_width / 2 egressleft = -ac_egress_width / 2 egressright = ac_egress_width / 2
frameleftout = unitleft - gs_frame_ovhg_left_out framerightout = unitright + gs_frame_ovhg_right_out frameleftin = unitleft - gs_frame_ovhg_left_in framerightin = unitright + gs_frame_ovhg_right_in frameDiff = (gs_frw1 - gs_frw2) / 2
if lod2D = DET2D_MIDDLE then egressright=egressright+gs_ds_w*(gs_frame_style_m=2) egressleft=egressleft-gs_ds_w*(gs_frame_style_m=2) endif
!************ Hotspots on Unit Size
if bShowUnitHotspots then add2 (gs_frame_width_right - gs_frame_width_left) / 2, WIDO_SILL-WALL_THICKNESS hotspot2 unitleft, 0, 100 hotspot2 unitright, 0, 101 hotspot2 unitleft, -gs_fthk, 102 hotspot2 unitright, -gs_fthk, 103 del 1 endif
!************ Hotspots on Leaf Size
if bShowLeafHotspots then add2 0, WIDO_SILL-WALL_THICKNESS hotspot2 leafleft, 0, 300 hotspot2 leafright, 0, 301 hotspot2 leafleft, -gs_fthk, 302 hotspot2 leafright, -gs_fthk, 303 del 1 endif
!**************************** Simple frame without sidelight !***********************************************************
!************ Hotspots on Egress Size
if lod2D = DET2D_MIDDLE then egressthk1=0 egressthk2=-gs_fthk else egressthk1=-gs_leaf_thk egressthk2=-gs_leaf_thk-gs_ds_thk endif
if bShowEgressHotspots then add2 0, WIDO_SILL-WALL_THICKNESS if gs_frame_style_m = 1 then hotspot2 egressleft + frameDiff, 0 hotspot2 egressright + frameDiff, 0 else hotspot2 egressleft + frameDiff, egressthk1 hotspot2 egressright + frameDiff, egressthk1 endif
if gs_frame_style_m = 2 then hotspot2 egressleft + frameDiff, egressthk2 hotspot2 egressright + frameDiff, egressthk2 else hotspot2 egressleft + frameDiff, -gs_fthk hotspot2 egressright + frameDiff, -gs_fthk endif del 1 endif
!************* Hotspots on Leaf Size
if lod2D = DET2D_MIDDLE then leafthk1=-gs_fthk leafleft1=leafleft+gs_rebate_width leafright1=leafright-gs_rebate_width else leafthk1=-gs_leaf_thk leafleft1=leafleft leafright1=leafright endif
if bShowAddHotspots & (lod2D = DET2D_MIDDLE | lod2D = DET2D_DETAILED) then add2 0, WIDO_SILL-WALL_THICKNESS if gs_frame_style_m = 3 then hotspot2 leafleft1 + frameDiff, 0 hotspot2 leafright1 + frameDiff, 0 hotspot2 leafleft1 + frameDiff, leafthk1 hotspot2 leafright1 + frameDiff, leafthk1 else hotspot2 leafleft + frameDiff, 0 hotspot2 leafright + frameDiff, 0 hotspot2 leafleft + frameDiff, -gs_fthk hotspot2 leafright + frameDiff, -gs_fthk endif del 1 endif
! FRAME !! pen gs_frame_pen_cont if lod2D = DET2D_MIDDLE then
!*********************** Simple or 1:100
fill gs_fillFr
add2 (gs_frame_width_right - gs_frame_width_left) / 2, WIDO_SILL-WALL_THICKNESS poly2_b 4, 1+2+4+32, gs_penFr_fg, gs_penFr_bg, unitleft + gs_frame_width_left, 0, 1+32, unitleft, 0, 1+32, unitleft, -gs_fthk, 1+32, unitleft + gs_frame_width_left, -gs_fthk, 1+32
poly2_b 4, 1+2+4+32, gs_penFr_fg, gs_penFr_bg, unitright - gs_frame_width_right, 0, 1+32, unitright, 0, 1+32, unitright, -gs_fthk, 1+32, unitright - gs_frame_width_right, -gs_fthk, 1+32 del 1 endif
if lod2D = DET2D_DETAILED then
!*********************** Detailed or 1:50
if gs_frame_style_m=1 then leafleft2=-ac_egress_width/2 leafright2=ac_egress_width/2 else leafleft2=-ac_leaf_width/2 leafright2=ac_leaf_width/2 endif
FILL gs_fillFr
add2 (gs_frame_width_right - gs_frame_width_left) / 2, WIDO_SILL-WALL_THICKNESS poly2_b 4, 1+2+4+32, gs_penFr_fg, gs_penFr_bg, unitleft + gs_frame_width_left, 0, 1+32, unitleft, 0, 1+32, unitleft, -gs_fthk, 1+32, unitleft + gs_frame_width_left, -gs_fthk, 1+32
poly2_b 4, 1+2+4+32, gs_penFr_fg, gs_penFr_bg, unitright - gs_frame_width_right, 0, 1+32, unitright, 0, 1+32, unitright, -gs_fthk, 1+32, unitright - gs_frame_width_right, -gs_fthk, 1+32 del 1 endif !! END OF FRAME !!
!! LEAF !! pen gs_leaf_pen_2D if gs_mot_m = 0 then ! PANEL TYPE = EMPTY
if gs_iSwingType = LINE_SHAPE_SWING_SIMPLE_LINE | gs_iSwingType = LINE_SHAPE_SWING_LEAF_LINE then drawindex 20
pen gs_opLinePen line_type gs_swingLineType
add2 0, WIDO_SILL - WALL_THICKNESS - (gs_frame_thk/2) * (lod2D <> DET2D_SIMPLE) hotspot2 0, -0.50, unID_Opening hotspot2 0, 0.50, unID_Opening + 1 line2 0, -0.50, 0, 0.50 del 1 endif
end else
add2 a/2, WIDO_SILL-WALL_THICKNESS
!!!! HOTSPOT EDITING !!!! if gs_full_edit & gs_passdoor & (gs_iSwingType <> LINE_SHAPE_SWING_SIMPLE_LINE) & (gs_iSwingType <> LINE_SHAPE_SWING_LEAF_LINE) then unID=unID+1 hotspot2 -gs_bkx/2+0.02, 0, unID, gs_open_2D, 6+512 unID=unID+1 hotspot2 -gs_bkx/2+0.02-gs_passdoorWidth, 0, unID, gs_open_2D, 4+128 unID=unID+1 hotspot2 -gs_bkx/2+0.02-gs_passdoorWidth*cos(gs_open_2D), gs_passdoorWidth*sin(gs_open_2D), unID, gs_open_2D, 5 endif !!!! END OF HOTSPOT EDITING !!!!
if lod2D = DET2D_SIMPLE | lod2D = DET2D_MIDDLE then line_type gs_linetype if not(gs_passdoor) then line2 -a, 0, 0, 0 if gs_iSwingType = LINE_SHAPE_SWING_SIMPLE_LINE | gs_iSwingType = LINE_SHAPE_SWING_LEAF_LINE then drawindex 20
pen gs_opLinePen line_type gs_swingLineType
add2 -a/2, (-gs_frame_thk/2) * (lod2D = DET2D_MIDDLE) hotspot2 0, -0.50, unID_Opening hotspot2 0, 0.50, unID_Opening + 1 line2 0, -0.50, 0, 0.50 del 1 endif else line2 -a, 0, -gs_bkx/2+0.02-gs_passdoorWidth, 0 line2 -gs_bkx/2+0.02, 0, 0, 0
if gs_iSwingType = LINE_SHAPE_SWING_SIMPLE_LINE | gs_iSwingType = LINE_SHAPE_SWING_LEAF_LINE then drawindex 20
pen gs_opLinePen line_type gs_swingLineType
add2 -gs_bkx/2+0.02-gs_passdoorWidth/2, (-gs_frame_thk/2) * (lod2D = DET2D_MIDDLE) hotspot2 0, -0.50, unID_Opening hotspot2 0, 0.50, unID_Opening + 1 line2 0, -0.50, 0, 0.50 del 1 else line2 -gs_bkx/2+0.02-gs_passdoorWidth*cos(gs_open_2D), gs_passdoorWidth*sin(gs_open_2D), -gs_bkx/2+0.02, 0 pen gs_opLinepen line_type gs_swingLineType if abs(gs_open_2D)>eps then if gs_iSwingType = LINE_SHAPE_SWING_CURVED then arc2 -gs_bkx/2+0.02, 0, gs_passdoorWidth, 180-gs_open_2D, 180 else line2 -gs_bkx/2+0.02-gs_passdoorWidth*cos(gs_open_2D), gs_passdoorWidth*sin(gs_open_2D), -gs_passdoorWidth-gs_bkx/2+0.02, 0 endif endif endif endif line_type gs_linetype endif if lod2D = DET2D_DETAILED then line_type gs_linetype
if not(gs_passdoor) then poly2_b 5, 1+2*gs_bFills+4+64, gs_penLeaf_fg, gs_penLeaf_bg, -a, 0, 1+32, -a, -gs_leaf_thk, 1+32, 0, -gs_leaf_thk, 1+32, 0, 0, 1+32, -a, 0, -1
if gs_iSwingType = LINE_SHAPE_SWING_SIMPLE_LINE | gs_iSwingType = LINE_SHAPE_SWING_LEAF_LINE then drawindex 20
pen gs_opLinePen line_type gs_swingLineType
add2 -a/2, -gs_frame_thk/2 hotspot2 0, -0.50, unID_Opening hotspot2 0, 0.50, unID_Opening + 1 line2 0, -0.50, 0, 0.50 del 1 endif else poly2_b 5, 1+2*gs_bFills+4+64, gs_penLeaf_fg, gs_penLeaf_bg, -a, 0, 1+32, -a, -gs_leaf_thk, 1+32, -gs_bkx/2+0.02-gs_passdoorWidth, -gs_leaf_thk, 1+32, -gs_bkx/2+0.02-gs_passdoorWidth, 0, 1+32, -a, 0, -1
poly2_b 5, 1+2*gs_bFills+4+64, gs_penLeaf_fg, gs_penLeaf_bg, 0, 0, 1+32, 0, -gs_leaf_thk, 1+32, -gs_bkx/2+0.02, -gs_leaf_thk, 1+32, -gs_bkx/2+0.02, 0, 1+32, 0, 0, -1
if gs_iSwingType = LINE_SHAPE_SWING_SIMPLE_LINE | gs_iSwingType = LINE_SHAPE_SWING_LEAF_LINE then drawindex 20
pen gs_opLinePen line_type gs_swingLineType
add2 -gs_bkx/2+0.02-gs_passdoorWidth/2, -gs_frame_thk/2 hotspot2 0, -0.50, unID_Opening hotspot2 0, 0.50, unID_Opening + 1 line2 0, -0.50, 0, 0.50 del 1 else add2 -gs_bkx/2+0.02, 0 rot2 -gs_open_2D poly2_b 5, 1+2*gs_bFills+4+64, gs_penLeaf_fg, gs_penLeaf_bg, 0, 0, 1+32, 0, -gs_leaf_thk, 1+32, -gs_passdoorWidth, -gs_leaf_thk, 1+32, -gs_passdoorWidth, 0, 1+32, 0, 0, -1 del 2
pen gs_opLinepen line_type gs_swingLineType if abs(gs_open_2D)>eps then if gs_iSwingType = LINE_SHAPE_SWING_CURVED then arc2 -gs_bkx/2+0.02, 0, gs_passdoorWidth, 180-gs_open_2D+ASN(gs_leaf_thk/gs_passdoorWidth), 180 else line2 -gs_bkx/2+0.02-gs_passdoorWidth*cos(gs_open_2D), gs_passdoorWidth*sin(gs_open_2D), -gs_passdoorWidth-gs_bkx/2+0.02, 0 endif endif endif endif line_type gs_linetype endif if gs_opline_2D then line_type gs_opline_type_2D pen gs_opLinepen poly2_ 4, 1, 0, -gs_leaf_thk, 1, 0, -b, 1, -a, -b, 1, -a, -gs_leaf_thk, 1 line2 -a, -gs_leaf_thk, 0, -b line2 0, -gs_leaf_thk, -a, -b line_type gs_linetype endif
del 1 endif !! END OF LEAF !!
end
Symbol.Script_1D:
EPS = 0.00001
if GLOB_SCRIPT_TYPE <> 5 then if GLOB_CONTEXT = 6 then ! Window Schedule - 3D view should NOT display sash in open position gs_open_3D = 0 gs_open3D = 0 endif endif
DET2D_OFF = 0 DET2D_SCALESENS = -1 DET2D_SIMPLE = 11 DET2D_MIDDLE = 21 DET2D_DETAILED = 30 DET2D_SIMPLE_CHI = 51 DET2D_DETAILED_CHI = 52
! gs_iSwingType: LINE_SHAPE_SWING_NONE = 0 LINE_SHAPE_SWING_CURVED = 1 LINE_SHAPE_SWING_STRAIGHT = 2 LINE_SHAPE_SWING_SIMPLE_LINE = 3 LINE_SHAPE_SWING_LEAF_LINE = 4
unID = 450
track_dz = 0.063 gs_track_thk = 0.057
fb = b+gs_frwt gs_a=a gs_b=b gs_pv=gs_frame_pthk ! Profile thickness
gs_mot_m=0 gs_btype_m=1 IF iDoorPanelType=1 THEN gs_mot_m=3 ! HORIZONTAL RIBBED IF iDoorPanelType=2 THEN gs_mot_m=2 ! VERTICAL RIBBED IF iDoorPanelType=3 THEN gs_mot_m=1 ! CASETTED IF iDoorPanelType=31 THEN gs_mot_m=4 ! CUSTOM PANEL
gs_bkx=6" gs_bky=5" gs_ufw=1"
gs_gtav=0.053 gm=0.045 gs_gm = 0.045 gt=0.088+track_dz*0
sza = gs_a + gs_frame_width_left + gs_frame_width_right - 0.11
szb=gs_b+gs_frwt-0.063 sszb=(szb-gm/2)/gs_section_num IF (SQR(sszb**2/2))+gt<0.42 THEN gs_track_radius=(SQR(sszb**2/2))+gt ELSE gs_track_radius=0.42
rk = gs_track_radius rkk=rk-gt tokb=gs_b+gs_frwt szut=tokb-rk-gm/2+0.5*PI*(rk-gt) op3D=gs_open3D/szut*100
szute=tokb-rk-gm/2 IF ((rkk**2+rkk**2-sszb**2)/2/rkk/rkk)>=-1 AND ((rkk**2+rkk**2-sszb**2)/2/rkk/rkk)<=1 THEN teta=ACS((rkk**2+rkk**2-sszb**2)/2/rkk/rkk) zeta=90-teta utv=op3D/100*szut
gs_szekc_m=(szb-gs_gm/2)/gs_section_num rah=gs_rail_h-gs_szekc_m*(gs_section_num-1)
IF gs_mot_m=1 THEN gs_bet_sz=(sza-(gs_hor_pnum+1)*gs_bkx)/gs_hor_pnum gs_passdoorWidth=gs_bet_sz+gs_bkx ENDIF
IF gs_mot_m=2 OR gs_mot_m=3 THEN IF gs_rail_h<(gs_section_num-1)*sszb+gs_bky THEN gs_rail_h=(gs_section_num-1)*sszb+gs_bky IF gs_bGlazedDoor=1 THEN gs_bet_sz=(sza-(gs_hor_pnum+1)*gs_bkx)/gs_hor_pnum gs_passdoorWidth=gs_bet_sz+gs_bkx ENDIF ENDIF
Symbol.Script_VL: CALL "sectGar_3d" PARAMETERS a = sza, b = szb, gs_gm = gm, gs_section_num = gs_section_num, gs_mot_m = gs_mot_m, gs_hor_pnum = gs_hor_pnum, gs_ver_pnum = gs_ver_pnum, gs_bkx = gs_bkx, gs_bky = gs_bky, gs_bGlazedDoor = gs_bGlazedDoor, gs_rail_h = gs_rail_h, bEnableKickBoard = bEnableKickBoard, bKickBoardOut = bKickBoardOut, bKickBoardIn = bKickBoardIn, kickBoardHeight = kickBoardHeight, matKickBoardOut = matKickBoardOut, matKickBoardIn = matKickBoardIn

Boolean.Name: AC_HoleMaterialCurved
Boolean.Description: "Hole Surface's Split is Curved in Curved Walls"

PenColor.Name: gs_trim_pen_cont
PenColor.Description: "Casing Cut Line Pen on Both Sides"

Boolean.Name: gs_bOpeningToZone
Boolean.Description: "Door belongs to the Zone into which it opens"
